title.narrative: Program formulation of Danish support to the African Water Facility

description.narrative: The Department for Sustainable Investments, Jobs and Equal Opportunities (GJL) is seeking a consultant to support to formulation of new Danish support to the African Water Facility. The overall objective of the consultancy covering a period of January to June 2021 is to finalize a draft concept note including all required annexes and develop, in close collaboration with AWF and MFA, a programme document and all required annexes in a final format ultimately ready for approval by the Danida Programme Committee, Council for Development Policy and the Minister, according to the Danida AMG for programmes above 39 DKK millions.

sector.narrative: Water sector policy and administrative management
